name: when-umd-disthack
description: This is a cheap hack to allow a Bower dist of when for the browser.

scripts.update: npm view when dist-tags.latest | npm version && npm view when dist-tags.latest | npm install --save when@=
scripts.build:sh: npm run update && npm run clean && cp node_modues/when/dist/browser/* when && git commit -a -m "Release $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version -a -m "$npm_package_version" && npm run git-push
scripts.build:cmd: npm run update npm run clean && copy node_modules\when\dist\browser when && git commit -a -m "Release %npm_package_version%" && git tag %npm_package_version% -a -m "%npm_package_version%" && npm run git-push
